data.name: AWS Cost Optimisation Levers, Tools, and Strategies
data.summary:
Best practices for cost aware architecting
How to use AWS services in the most cost-effective manner such as choosing the right service and matching supply with demand
AWS platform features and tools that support cost optimisation for better visibility and monitoring
Actionable tips that can be implemented immediately
data.speakers:
Shiva Achari, Startup Solutions Architect, AISPL
Anshuman Nanda, Startup Solution Architect, AISPL
Sathish Hariharan, Startup Solution Architect, AISPL
